metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17007 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Network Security Services before 3.44, a malformed Netscape Certificate Sequence can cause NSS to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17007` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5+esm3
libnss3-1d - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5+esm3
libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5+esm3
libnss3-tools - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nss package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5+esm3').
